user.title: Switch Energy Statistics Configuration
user.description: Configure energy monitoring for your switches. You'll select individual entities for each gang in the next step.

data.gang_count: Number of Gangs (how many switches to monitor)
data.name: Name (friendly name for this monitoring group)

gang_entities.title: Gang Entity Selection
gang_entities.description: Select the switch/light entity for each gang. Each gang can be any switch or light entity in your Home Assistant.

gang_config.title: Gang Power Configuration
gang_config.description: Set power consumption in watts for each gang. This is the power consumed when the switch is ON.

error.invalid_switch_entity: Selected switch entity is not valid or not found
error.no_switch_entities: No switch entities found. Please ensure you have switches or lights configured in Home Assistant.

abort.no_switch_entities: No switch or light entities found in your Home Assistant installation. Please add some switches/lights first.

init.title: Update Power Settings
init.description: Update the power consumption settings for each gang: {gang_entities}
